Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player of a game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String nickname, TowerColor color)
    Constructor IInstantiates this player initializing his chosen nickname and his chosen color of the tower, then sets its state in wait.

    Method
    Description
    void
    addAssistant(int position)
    Sets lastUsed with the card from the deck at the specified position.

    Adds one coin at this player.

    Initializes the model's listener.
    void
    changeState(PlayerState state)
    Sets the state of this player with the specified state, then if the specified state is "ENDTURN" it notifies any change at the model's listeners.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, TowerColor color)
      Constructor IInstantiates this player initializing his chosen nickname and his chosen color of the tower, then sets its state in wait.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the chosen nickname.
      color - the chosen color of the tower.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp(List<Student> student, boolean expert, int numPlayer)
      Initializes player's board, player's deck, lastUsed and, if the game is played in expert mode, the number of coins of this player.
      Parameters:
      student - the list of students to fill the entrance of the player's board.
      expert - true only if the game is played in expert mode.
      numPlayer - the number of player in the game.

    • removeCoin

      public void removeCoin(int numCoin)
      Decreases the number of coins owned by this player by the specified number.
      Parameters:
      numCoin - the number of coins to remove from player's coins.

    • addCoin

      public void addCoin()
      Adds one coin at this player.

    • changeState

      public void changeState(PlayerState state)
      Sets the state of this player with the specified state, then if the specified state is "ENDTURN" it notifies any change at the model's listeners.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to set.

    • addAssistant

      public void addAssistant(int position)
      Sets lastUsed with the card from the deck at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the card to remove from the deck.

    • attach

      public void attach(ModelListener modelListener)
      Initializes the model's listener.
      Parameters:
      modelListener - the listener that will be notified when a specified sequence occurs.

    • notifyView

      public void notifyView()
      Notifies view when a sequence of changes occurs.
